page.title: 01Rural Area South of Nantwich
page.content: The main occupation of the area is dairy farming with a small amount of beef rearing and lowland sheep farming. The majority of the farms are between 100 and 150 acres in size with fields averaging 10 acres (range 3 to 20 acres) Two other main employers in the area, beside the farmers, are, the cattle food mill at Aston and the cheese factory in Newhall. The factory is the only one in the country where limeswold cheese is made. The majority of those people who live in the area but are not directly connected with agriculture are employed either in Nantwich or Crewe, 3 and 5 miles away respectively.The main centre of occupatin is in and around the village of Aslon.There are no shops in the village the nearest vilage stores are at Wrenbury Heath and the larger village of Wrenbury.There are
